thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 75 of 625
thread.title: Amanda Stidman

author: Amanda Stidman
title: Amanda Stidman
text:
Clothes are good quality for the price.I am a size 20,currently pregnant, usually i am a 16.The pants fit great in belly but are a bit loose in the leg because my legs have not gained much during the pregnancy so if you dont have chunky legs then i'd order a size down they do stretch a lot.
The sports bra i got in a xxl_ (lately im a 40B)im not huge up top or broad it fits perfectly and has room for my growing boobs.lol i will continue to order until i get too big and then use these post baby to lose all the weight.
Only complaint is not a lot of options for tops or jackets in the 2X size i am needing right now but i like the leggins so far.
